headline: IFF Introduces Science of Performance: A New Approach to Elevating Scent Design
summary: PARIS, April 01, 2025--IFF (NYSE: IFF) unveils its Science of Performance program, a comprehensive, science-driven suite that enhances fragrance creation by increasing efficiency and precision to manage scent intensity and control malodors. The program combines decades of measured data enhanced by proprietary AI capabilities, along with advanced sensory, technical, consumer and market expertise in various end-user applications.
